channel.title: Change you status!
channel.description: this is a question for induvial people who advertise sites but when there down they continue to advertise them as online its wasting my time and im sure it wastes other peoples time to so heres my question: why the hell don't you change your status!?

the owner might not have turned the server source on
the owner is updating server)

item.title: Change you status!
item.dc:creator: @liljon liljon
item.description:
@liljon wrote:

Most people change there status. A reason why it may say online but its offline. The server crashed and the owner isnt home? Did you think of that. This is also considered as spam. This Section is for Questions NOT complaints.

Read full topic
